description: Two online multiple-choice tests (Week 5 and Week 9) assessing threshold topics. Requires 15/20 threshold mark per test with multiple resit opportunities. Tests drawn from same question bank as weekly quizzes.
8 weekly multiple-choice quizzes (10 questions each) testing threshold concepts from online lessons. Requires one perfect score (10/10) within 2 weeks per quiz for credit.
2hr 10min examination during official university period assessing mastery topics. Includes MCQ, short numerical and short answer questions covering lectures, tutorials and labs.

Weekly practical assessments including core skills (hurdle requirement) and non-core skills (10% each). Requires attendance at 6/8 labs, demonstrated competency in core skills, and submission of lab reports.
